name: office-excel-add-in-data-types-explorer
title: Create and explore data types in Excel
shortDescription: An Excel add-in that creates and explores data types in your workbooks.
longDescription: Builds an Excel add-in that creates and explores data types in your workbooks. Data types enable add-in developers to organize complex data structures as objects, such as formatted number values, web images, and entities.

thumbnails.alt: An entity value data type in Excel with the card window displayed.

references.name: Overview of data types in Excel add-ins
references.description: Data types organize complex data structures as objects. This includes formatted number values, web images, and entities as entity cards.
